casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Solomon GELB, Appellant. No. 287. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 20, 1939. Robert H. Elder, of New York City (Otho S. Bowling, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Gregory F. Noonan, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Frank H. Gordon, of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before L. HAND and CHASE, Circuit Judges, and PATTERSON, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
